name: Dragon Audit
description:
Dragon Audit is the #1 adventure game about dragons and auditing them!
A battle accountant storms the castle to rescue a princess, but accidentally rescues an overly friendly dragoness instead. Now they're on a wild adventure to save his hometown from dark forces.FeaturesClassic point & click adventure gameplay.
Some of the characters are dragons!
Anime inspired 3D visual style.
Only a few of the characters are accountants.
Modern third person-style movement controls.
You can throw calculators at dragons!
But you shouldn't, because that's mean.
Please stop throwing calculators at me.The Four Episode Trilogy
The game is planned as a "four episode trilogy," with the first episode launching in Winter 2018. This first episode corresponds to the first story arc of the game, about 1.5~2hrs in length.
If people enjoy the first episode, then I can make two more episodes for the middle and final arcs of the story. Finally, the fourth episode would add a 'new game+' mode, which would allow for different decisions at key points resulting in a playthrough with a different character who has their own separate story.Main Characters
